name: Regnum sine Aquā
description:
Your enemy, the Gallic kingdom, is running out of water, yet they continue to thrive thanks to the aid of allied kingdoms.  As a spy for the army of Rome, you must infiltrate the enemy kingdom and relay what you see and hear happening back to your army. To do this, you must translate your observations back into Latin.

Aid to the kingdom will be delivered  if no information is relayed—it's up to you to thwart arriving shipments, reduce the enemy kingdom to rubble and conquer for Rome!

(RMMV project; knowledge of Latin declensions required)
